PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-08632009-06-04EC,  HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectChromium Electroplating, Chromium Anodizing and Reverse Etching Regulations
PrecisDesigned to protect the environment and human health by reducing emissions of hexavalent chromium compounds (HVC) into the atmosphere from facilities using chromic acid in their chromium electroplating, chromium anodizing or reverse etching operations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0162 Publication Date: 2009-06-24
AttachmentsAttachment
